title: 95 MB daily
info: 95 MB Internet for 1 day for 10 Afghanis. Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate. Dial *477*1*1# to activate.

title: 200 MB daily
info: 200 MB of Internet for 1 day at the price of 15 Afghanis. To activate, press the green button and to deactivate, press the red button. To activate, dial *477*15*1#.

title: 400 MB daily
info: 400 MB of Internet for 1 day at the price of 30 Afghanis. To activate, press the green button and to deactivate, press the red button. To activate, dial *477*2*1#.

title: 1 GB daily
info: 1 GB Internet for 1 day for 50 Afghanis. Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate. Dial *477*50*1# to activate.

title: 2 GB daily
info: 2 GB Internet for 1 day at the price of 77 Afghani. Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate. Dial *477*77*1# to activate.

title: 3 GB daily
info: 3GB of Internet for 1 day at the price of 99 Afghanis. Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate. Dial *477*99*1# to activate.
